title: 10 Sustainable & Eco-Friendly Brands Looking for Creator Partnerships
excerpt: Partner with brands that share your values. This 2025 list features 10 amazing sustainable and eco-friendly brands in fashion, beauty, and lifestyle that are looking for authentic creator partnerships.
content:
Collaborate with a Conscience

As a creator who champions sustainability, authenticity is everything. Your audience trusts you to recommend products that align with your shared values. The good news is that the sustainable market is booming, and brands are desperate to partner with genuine voices to tell their stories. This list highlights 10 forward-thinking, eco-friendly brands that are actively seeking creator and ambassador partnerships in 2025.

Attract Your Dream Sustainable Sponsor

Imagine your favorite ethical brand bidding to sponsor your next video. It's possible. Post your content ideas on Newcollab and connect with brands that truly match your values.

List a Project Idea

10 Sustainable Brands to Partner With

These brands are leaders in the ethical space and have a history of successful creator collaborations.

  1. Patagonia: The gold standard in sustainable outdoor apparel. Their ambassador program is highly sought after and focuses on storytelling.
  2. Allbirds: Famous for their comfortable, sustainable footwear made from natural materials. They run frequent influencer campaigns.
  3. Pact: Offers organic cotton apparel for the whole family. They have a great affiliate program and work with creators of all sizes.
  4. Bite: Zero-waste personal care, known for their toothpaste bits. A perfect partner for creators in the low-waste lifestyle niche.
  5. Tentree: Sustainable apparel brand that plants ten trees for every item purchased. They have a large and active ambassador community.
  6. EarthHero: An online marketplace for sustainable products, like an eco-friendly Amazon. Their affiliate program is extensive.
  7. ThredUP: One of the largest online consignment and thrift stores. They partner with fashion creators to promote secondhand shopping.
  8. Blueland: Eco-friendly cleaning products with reusable packaging. They work heavily with creators on platforms like Instagram and TikTok.
  9. Cariuma: A stylish, sustainable sneaker brand that plants trees in the Brazilian rainforest for every pair sold.
  10. Package Free Shop: A marketplace for zero-waste lifestyle products, founded by influencer Lauren Singer. They are deeply integrated into the creator community.

"Pitching sustainable brands is tough because they care so much about authenticity. With Newcollab, I could post my 'Thrift Haul Challenge' idea, and ThredUP bid on it. It was a perfect match."

- Maya G., Sustainable Fashion Creator

Proving Your Value to Ethical Brands

For these brands, your 'why' is more important than your numbers. In your pitch and media kit, be sure to highlight your personal connection to sustainability and how your audience shares those values. Show them you're a genuine advocate, not just looking for a paycheck.

Conclusion: Make an Impact and an Income

Partnering with sustainable brands allows you to monetize your content without compromising your values. Use this list to find companies that align with your mission. To take it a step further, bring your creative campaign ideas to the Newcollab marketplace, and build the authentic, long-term partnerships that will define your creator career.

faq.question: What do sustainable brands look for in a creator?
faq.answer: They look for authenticity above all else. They want to see that you have a genuine passion for sustainability that is integrated into your content, not just a one-off post. A highly engaged community that shares these values is also crucial.

faq.question: Are there paid opportunities with these brands?
faq.answer: Yes. While some may start with gifted products or affiliate programs, many of these brands have significant budgets for paid sponsorships with creators who can demonstrate a strong, authentic connection with their audience.

faq.question: How do I prove my 'sustainability' to a brand?
faq.answer: Your content is your proof. Showcase your knowledge, feature sustainable practices in your daily life, and engage in meaningful conversations about ethical consumption. In your media kit, include a section about your personal values and mission.
